EmailTemplate.name: HeadStart Application Pack Template 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: HEADSTART APPLICATIONS NOW OPEN!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart | The Challenge
An exclusive opportunity for YOU from The Challenge…
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Applications for HeadStart are now open!
The deadline for applications is midnight Sunday 11th October 2015. Places are limited so apply early to avoid disappointment.
You will need either your email address or your NCS ID, and the below PIN to log in to the site:
Email Address: {!Contact.Email}
NCS ID: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c}
PIN: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
CLICK HERE to sign in and start your application!
The HeadStart programme is made up of three simple steps:
Volunteer for at least 16 hours with a local charity. We’ll help you find the volunteering opportunity that fits with your interests and your free time.
Engage in exclusive skills workshops, developed with leading employers to give you the right skills and aptitude to get ahead.
Get a guaranteed interview for a paid part-time/seasonal job with one of our corporate partners - New Look, Starbucks, Lloyds Bank, Greater London Authority (GLA) and Zendesk.
HeadStart will help you:
Gain skills and experience
Be more employable
Stand out on your UCAS form
Meet new people and get back together with friends from NCS
Any questions? Email the HeadStart team, check out our website or get in touch on Facebook or Twitter
We look forward to receiving your application!
The HeadStart team
